Fresh Mex!

Just finished the recorded Sunday night football game. Huge win for my Cowboys!
Just went on a walk in the snow with @rnoelle. Now we're gonna bust out some hot cocoa & play some Lego Batman! Recording the Cowboys game.

Just got out of our crawl space looking for the outside water shut-off valve. Think I might have seen a gnome or two living down there.

We have snow!
Downtown at Iyara Thai Restaurant with @rnoelle and some friends.

Sipping coffee and introspectively contemplating life.
Done! Time to get our grub on while watching some season 3 Friday Night Lights.
Waiting for the oven to spit out the manicotti. 2 more minutes!
Wow. @rnoelle kicked it up a notch. I count over 180 different snowman holiday decorations of some capacity around the house. Obsessed much?

Putting up garlands and hoping the Vikings come back to beat the Falcons.
